job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: strongCareers that Change LivesbrbrstrongIn this exciting role you will provide services to support the Software Development and Information Technology Operations of safety critical software for medical devices which over 400000 people depend on each daybrbrA career at Medtronic is like no other Were purposeful Were committed And were driven by our Mission to alleviate pain restore health and extend life for millions of people worldwidebrbrstrongA Day in the LifebrstrongulliPartners with development teams to establish the file structure of the project Source Control librariesliliEnsures all project source materials are maintained in the Source Control library including software source code and project documentationliliAdministers the Source Control tool providing maintenance and troubleshootingliliPartners with development teams and System Administrators in the establishment of project environments including define and document project environment requirements project servers set up and deployment of project amp 3rd party softwareliliDocument schedule and executes project software buildsliliDocument SCM Plans Release and Build ProceduresliliPrepares reviews submits maintains and provides status on projectproduct documentationliliPerforms and documents software builds using existing build procedures and scripts liliSupports analysis of build data to report and communicate software build results status errors etc liliWrites basic scripts eg support build test static analysis and maintain more complex scriptsliliPerforms validation activities of software development toolsliliGathers required metrics and generatesprovides reports as directed liliIntegrates verification tools into build process under direction of engineersbrliulResponsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assignedbrulliDesigns develops tests debugs and implements operating systems components software tools and utilitiesliliDetermines systems software design requirementsliliEnsures that system improvements are successfully implemented and monitored to increase efficiencyliliGenerates systems software engineering policies standards and proceduresbrliulstrongMust Have Minimum RequirementsbrstrongulliBachelors degree in Engineering or Sciencesliul strongNice to HavebrstrongulliExperience on a variety of DevOps toolsets IAR Surround GIT Integrity PLM etcliliStrong knowledge of configuration management industry standards and best practicesliliKnowledge of Software Development Life Cycle SDLC liliExperience in specifying and implementing DevOps solutions with IT to support distributed software teamsliliSignificant experience and success in development of scripts and applications to facilitate automation of software builds and releases liliExpert knowledge of the underlying concepts of Branching Merging and Archiving software throughout the development lifecycleliliIn depth knowledge of software configuration management processes and practices Applies knowledge of the software development environment from end user perspective to ensure usability of SCM processesliliExperience creating application specific documentation and ensure dependencies and compatibilities through appropriate verificationliliSolution orientated generates multiple innovative solutions to complex or criticalbrliulstronguAbout MedtronicbrbrustrongTogether we can change healthcare worldwide At Medtronic we push the limits of what technology therapies and services can do to help alleviate pain restore health and extend life We challenge ourselves and each other to make tomorrow better than yesterday It is what makes this an exciting and rewarding place to bebrbrWe want to accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations  but we will only succeed with the right people on our team Lets work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients lives Help us shape the futurebrbrPhysical Job RequirementsbrbrThe physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions For Office Roles While performing the duties of this job the employee is regularly required to be independently mobile The employee is also required to interact with a computer and communicate with peers and coworkers Contact your manager or local HR to understand the Work Conditions and Physical requirements that may be specific to each role ADAUnited States of AmericabrbrAdditional Informationbrulli Posting Date
